testcase.classname: End to End workflow to verify the final cost of the product
testcase.name: To verify the final cost of the product
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to base URL "https://www.saucedemo.com/".....................passed And Login to application with below credentials.............................passed Given Add below list of products in the cart................................passed When Open cart..............................................................passed And Check products count in the cart........................................passed And Click on checkout.......................................................passed And Add check out info......................................................passed And click on continue.......................................................passed Then Check Item total of the Products.......................................passed And Check Total Price.......................................................passed And Click on Finish.........................................................passed
